data.name: ApprovedSubject
data.value: Approval of Your Office Seat in the Deskbook Application System

data.name: ApprovedBody
data.value: We are pleased to inform you that your office seat request in the Deskbook Application System has been approved. Congratulations! Here are the details regarding your approved seat.

data.name: RejectedBody
data.value:
We hope this email finds you well. We have received your application and regret to inform you that your seat request has been rejected by the seat owner.
We understand that this may be disappointing news, and we want to assure you that our decision was not made lightly.
Thank you for your application, and we wish you the best of luck in your future endeavors.
